content.question: A cart of mass <math alttext="m equals 4 kilograms" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>kg</mtext></mstyle></math> slides along a horizontal surface with an initial velocity of <math alttext="5 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>5</mtext><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></mstyle></math>. A net force of <math alttext="8 newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>8</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext></mstyle></math> is then exerted on the cart in the direction of motion for <math alttext="3 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>3</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mstyle></math>. What is the average power delivered to the cart during the three seconds the force is applied?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
